Table of Contents 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package

  • Essential Tips for an Unforgettable 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package Experience
  • Top Experiences to Elevate Your Wonderful 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package Itinerary
  • Itinerary for Our 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package

Dubai is one of the fascinating tourist destinations; sited on the emirate’s northern coastline. The city attracts large number of tourists every year with its marvelous attractions, stunning skyline and grand shopping malls for all the shopping freaks. Travelers planning 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package can book this amazing Dubai holiday package from TourTripX and can spend some unforgettable time with a hassle free travel.

Essential Tips for an Unforgettable 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package Experience

DURATION

6 Nights 7 Days

HOTEL CATEGORY

4 / 5 Star

PICKUP & DROP

Delhi

EXPERIENCE

Premium

Respect local customs and traditions, carry essential items, and be mindful of the environment. Stay informed about weather conditions, particularly for outdoor activities. Make the most of your time exploring the cultural and historical heritage of these destinations.

Top Experiences to Elevate Your Wonderful 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package Itinerary

  • Visit world’s first Ferrari-themed park and features Formula Rossa, the world’s fastest roller coaster.
  • xplore the massive indoor theme of Warner bros. and get transported to awesome worlds of action and adventure, whimsy and wackiness straight out of your favourite cartoons and movies
  • Enjoy luxurious chauffeur driven Limousine ride.
  • Get marvelled at the amazing architecture at the world famous Shaikh Zayed mosque.
  • The View at the Palm to get 360-degree views of Palm Jumeirah.
  • Museum of The Future – one of the most beautiful architecture in Dubai.
  • Enjoy the thrill and fun of Dune bashing by a Four Wheel drive at Desert Dune Safari.
  • Enjoy the famous Belly Dance show with dinner.
  • Visit the floral marvel at Miracle Garden.
  • 360-degree views of Dubai from the 124th floor of Burj Khalifa.
  • Pass by the Atlantis and Dubai Marina area.
  • Take a quick photostop at Jumeirah Mosque & Burj Al Arab – the world’s only 7 star hotel.
  • Shop to your heart’s content at Gold Souk & Deira city centre.

Choose our 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for Our 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package

DAY 1

Arrival and Dhow Cruise

* Arrive in Dubai and transfer to your hotel.
* Check-in and freshen up.
* In the evening, enjoy a relaxing Dhow Cruise along Dubai Creek.
* Dinner on board with a traditional Arabian buffet.
* Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

DAY 2

Half day city tour and visit Burj Khalifa

* After breakfast, embark on a half-day city tour of Dubai.
* Visit landmarks such as Dubai Museum, Jumeirah Mosque, and the iconic Burj Al Arab.
* Head to the world’s tallest building, Burj Khalifa, for panoramic views of the city.
* Evening at leisure to explore Dubai Mall or relax.
* Overnight stay at the hotel.

DAY 3

Desert Safari and dinner

* Morning at leisure.
* In the afternoon, experience the thrilling Desert Safari.
* Enjoy dune bashing, camel riding, and sandboarding.
* Watch the sunset in the desert and savor a BBQ dinner at a desert camp.
* Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

DAY 4

Abu Dhabi City Tour and Ferrari World

* Depart for a full-day excursion to Abu Dhabi.
* Visit the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque and explore the city.
* Head to Ferrari World for a day of excitement and fun.
* Return to Dubai and overnight stay at the hotel.

DAY 5

Aqua-venture Waterpark and Lost Chambers

* Spend the day at Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark.
* Enjoy thrilling water rides and attractions.
* Visit the Lost Chambers Aquarium in the evening.
* Overnight stay at the hotel.

DAY 6

Dolphinarium visit and leisure Day

* Morning visit to the Dubai Dolphinarium for a delightful dolphin and seal show.
* Afternoon at leisure for shopping or optional activities.
* Relax and enjoy the amenities of the hotel.
* Overnight stay.

DAY 7

Departure

* Check-out from the hotel.
* Depending on your departure time, you may have some free time for last-minute shopping or exploration.
* Transfer to the airport for your departure.

Inclusions

  • Accommodation for 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package in a 4* hotel
  • Daily breakfast
  • Half Day City Tour of Dubai
  • Desert Safari with Tanura show, unlimited snacks, soft beverages, dinner & transfers on 4×4 safari vehicle.
  • Mircale Garden and Global Village with transfers
  • Yas Island 01 Day any 02 Parks (Ferrari World OR Warner Bros. World OR Yas Water World) with Transfers.
  • Return Dubai airport transfers.
  • All Tours and Transfers are on a sharing basis.

Exclusions

  • International Flights.
  • Dubai Visa + OTB charges.
  • Optional Tour.
  • Tipping.
  • GST and TCS
  • Insurance.
  • Dubai Tourism Tax to be paid directly at the Hotel.
  • Any other expenses which are not mentioned at the included section.
  • Extra PCR Tests as per the airline requirement on departure.
  • Entrances to the sightseeing points not included unless specifically mentioned in the Itinerary.
  • Early check in or late checkout charges.
  • Usage of vehicle beyond the given route drives after 06.00 PM, usage of guide beyond the mentioned timings or anything beyond the itinerary

Easy Cancellation
*31 days or more prior to departure date, Initial Booking Amount and additional amount of visa fee will be forfeited (in case visa has been applied).*Between 30–16 days : 75% of total tour cost will be charged as penalty. *Less than 15 days: 100% of total tour cost will be charges as penalty.

High Season
Prices can fluctuate during peak season dates.

Guaranteed Dates
Your selected travel dates are guaranteed. In the unlikely event of seats sold out, we guarantee +/- 1/2 days from your preferred dates.

Travel Validity
The deal is valid for travel till 30 Sep 2024.

Visa Easy
Visa assistance will be provided by our visa specialist.

Booking Policy
Initial Booking Amount – INR 15,000 per person or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable)
30 days prior to the departure date – 75% of the remaining tour cost.
15 days prior to the departure date – 100% of the tour cost required.
For Issuance of the Flight Tickets, we require Full Payment of Airfare.
Non- Refundable Services in the tour package have to be paid in full at the time of Booking.
Payment Policy is non-negotiable and has to be paid accordingly.

The 6 Nights 7 Days Dubai Tour Package exceeded our expectations. It offered beauty, luxury, and coastal beauty. Highly recommended!

Awnish kr. Sharma
